mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the vicinity of Richmond / made under the direction of Capt. A.H. Campbell, ., Chief of Topographical Dept. ; Ch'f Engineer's Office D.N.V., Col. J.F. Gilmer, Ch'f. Eng'r
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Campbell, Albert H. (Albert Henry), 1826-1899 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Confederate States of America. Engineer Department [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows woodlands, rivers, towns, and residents, with railroads, roads and a grid of the city of Richmond shown in red. [original]
Covers the area from the Pamunkey River in the northeast to Varina in the south then west to Short Pump and Chesterfield Court House. [original]
Handwritten following the title: "Approved March 21st 1863. Albert H. Campbell Capt. P. Engrs & Chf. Top. Dep. D.N.V." The map has been annotated in blue ink. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Deposit, William J. Cox, 4 East Cothwell St., Leesburg, VA, 1965 Jan. 8. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Landowners--Virginia--Henrico County--19th century--Maps
